content: April 27 The billionaire Steven A. Cohen must again face a lawsuit accusing him and his former firm SAC Capital Advisors LP of conspiring with other hedge funds to spread false rumors about Fairfax Financial Holdings Ltd to drive down its stock price.

content: NEW YORK Regions Financial Corp has agreed to $125 million of settlements to resolve lawsuits accusing it of mismanaging three Morgan Keegan bond mutual funds that collapsed in 2007 after investing heavily in subprime mortgages and other risky debt.
name: Regions Financial Corporation
title: Regions Financial reaches $125 million settlements over funds' collapse

content: NEW YORK  Jan 23 Regions Financial Corp  has agreed to $125 million of settlements to resolve lawsuits accusing it of mismanaging three Morgan Keegan bond mutual funds that collapsed in 2007 after investing heavily in subprime mortgages and other risky debt.
name: Regions Financial Corporation
title: Regions Financial reaches $125 mln settlements over funds' collapse

content: Jan 14 Morgan Keegan & Co on Wednesday settled a class action lawsuit accusing the brokerage of bilking investors who bought $39 million of municipal bonds meant to build a Missouri artificial sweetener plant that failed.
name: Regions Financial Corporation
title: Morgan Keegan settles lawsuit over failed Missouri sweetener plant
